snippet: The company is abandoning its Infinity effort in console games and toys. Strength at its studios was offset by weakness in some television businesses.
abstract: Walt Disney Company reports overall profit and revenue increased in fiscal second quarter, but missed expectations; net income was $2.14 billion, up from $2.11 billion in period year earlier, while revenue was up 4 percent from period year earlier at $12.97 billion; company announces it is pulling plug on video game and toy line Infinity.
lead_paragraph: The company is abandoning its Infinity effort in console games and toys. Strength at its studios was offset by weakness in some television businesses.

headline.main: Disney, With Mixed Earnings, Is Shutting Video Game Line
